      • blurSize

        public float blurSize()
        Specified by:
        blurSize in interface R2BlurParametersType
        Returns:
        The current blur size in texels

      • blurScale

        public float blurScale()
        The amount by which the image will be scaled during the blur operation. By scaling an image down, blurring it, and then scaling it back up again, the blur effect is emphasized without requiring additional passes.
        Specified by:
        blurScale in interface R2BlurParametersType
        Returns:
        The scale value for intermediate images

      • blurPasses

        public int blurPasses()
        The number of blur passes that will be used. If a value of 0 is given here, the image will only be scaled and not actually blurred (and will not actually even be scaled, if a value of 1.0 is given for blurScale()).
        Specified by:
        blurPasses in interface R2BlurParametersType
        Returns:
        The number of blur passes that will be used

      • blurScaleFilter

        public com.io7m.jcanephora.core.JCGLFramebufferBlitFilter blurScaleFilter()
        Specified by:
        blurScaleFilter in interface R2BlurParametersType
        Returns:
        The filter that will be used when an image is scaled via framebuffer blitting
